metadata.title: CVE-2023-3637 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An uncontrolled resource consumption flaw was found in openstack-neutron.This flaw allows a remote authenticated user to query a list of securitygroups for an invalid project. This issue creates resources that areunconstrained by the user's quota. If a malicious user were to submit asignificant number of requests, this could lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: neutron package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
